about_the_game:
A Mini-game - Jigsaws of memories
To piece together the blurry memories, help from the masters of cards is required. Move your fingers to unlock new stories and illustrations.
detailed_description:
A Mini-game - Jigsaws of memories
To piece together the blurry memories, help from the masters of cards is required. Move your fingers to unlock new stories and illustrations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7,Windows10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: To piece together the blurry memories, help from the masters of cards is required. Move your fingers to unlock new stories and illustrations.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
